overview: Kurt is responsible for execution of Greystripe’s strategic objectives and oversees all aspects of the company’s business operations. Prior to Greystripe, Kurt was as a Senior Associate at Monitor Ventures where he focused on evaluating investment opportunities and building early-stage businesses in the areas of mobile, media, software and business services. Previously, Kurt was an Engagement Manager at Monitor Group where he advised clients on various corporate strategy issues including development of growth strategies, organizational design and new business creation. Kurt was also a Project Manager at Sapient Corporation and is a graduate of Boston College.
